doc.title: A Spiritual Journey
doc.plot: Two filmmakers embark on a 6100-mile road trip to talk to ordinary Americans reflecting on their spirituality. Starting in their hometown of Austin, Texas, they travel from the Mexican Border in Texas to the Canadian Border in Montana, visiting some of the most scenic and spiritual places in the U.S. They visit seven national parks, several national forests, two national monuments, two state parks, an Indian reservation, and The Great Salt Lake.
